<% String eID = ""; // 7189132654 if(request!=null){ if(request.getHeader("EMP_VZW_EID")!=null){ // Getting the EID from VZW initially eID=request.getHeader("EMP_VZW_EID"); // For EMP Platform }else if(request.getHeader("EID")!=null){ // If not available look in regular headers eID=request.getHeader("EID"); // Enterprise SSO }else if(request.getHeader("SM_USERDN")!=null){ String tmp =request.getHeader("SM_USERDN"); // For VRDMobileEMP war file try{ eID = tmp.substring(tmp.indexOf('=')+1, tmp.indexOf(',')); }catch(Exception e){} } } %>
